Defining URL:http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/ValueSet/current-smoking-status-uv-ips
Name:IPSCurrentSmokingStatus
Definition:

Value Set based on HL7 Vocab TC and Structured Doc consensus (per CDC submission 7/12/2012 for smoking status term)

Publisher:HL7 International
Source ResourceXML / JSON / Turtle
  • Observation-tobaccoUse-uv-ips

IPSCurrentSmokingStatus

Value Set based on HL7 Vocab TC and Structured Doc consensus (per CDC submission 7/12/2012 for smoking status term)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    LA18976-3Current every day smoker
    LA18977-1Current some day smoker
    LA15920-4Former smoke
    LA18978-9Never smoker
    LA18979-7Smoker, current status unknown
    LA18980-5Unknown if ever smoked
    LA18981-3Heavy tobacco smoker
    LA18982-1Light tobacco smoker

Expansion

This value set contains 8 concepts
